content: At Hook, we are building a platform to connect health systems, payers, and patients, to enable a use case for clinical and claims data integration, all built on FHIR from the ground up. We're looking for FHIR freelance devs, familiar with Node and C#, to hire and expand our team! If interested or if you know someone who may be interested, please pm Lorenzo Granato or contact him at lorenzo@hook.md
